name: Arcane Name Generator
description: Unleash the mystic within! Craft names dripping with arcane power and otherworldly intrigue. Perfect for your next RPG character, fantasy novel, or just to sound ridiculously cool at parties.
introduction: Dive into the realm of the mystical and conjure names that resonate with ancient energies. Our Arcane Name Generator weaves together syllables of forgotten languages, infusing them with a touch of the unknown. Prepare to be amazed by the names you'll discover – names that whisper of forgotten lore and hidden power.
howToUse: Click the 'Generate' button. Duh! (But seriously, that's all it takes).
Behold! A brand new arcane name will appear before your very eyes.
Don't like it? Click again! The magic never stops.
Copy and paste your favorite name into your character sheet, manuscript, or social media bio. Prepare for envious stares.
Share the generator with your friends! Let them experience the arcane awesomeness too.

faqs.question: What exactly *is* an 'arcane' name?
faqs.answer: Think names that sound mysterious, magical, and a little bit dangerous. Names that hint at hidden knowledge and forbidden powers. Basically, names that would make Gandalf jealous.

faqs.question: Can I use these names for commercial purposes?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! These names are yours to command. Use them for your books, games, businesses – whatever your heart desires. Just don't blame us if you accidentally summon a demon.

faqs.question: Are the names generated truly random?
faqs.answer: As random as the whims of the cosmos allow! We use a sophisticated (okay, maybe not *that* sophisticated) algorithm to combine prefixes and suffixes in unpredictable ways. Expect the unexpected.

faqs.question: Will these names help me become a powerful sorcerer?
faqs.answer: We can't guarantee magical abilities, but a cool name is definitely a step in the right direction! Confidence is key, and a name like 'Xylos the Shadowbinder' is bound to turn heads (and maybe even bend reality a little).

faqs.question: I got a name I don't like. Is the generator broken?
faqs.answer: Nope! Taste is subjective, even in the arcane arts. Just click 'Generate' again! There are countless possibilities waiting to be discovered.

faqs.question: Can I suggest new prefixes or suffixes?
faqs.answer: We're always open to suggestions! Send us your ideas and we'll see if they resonate with the arcane energies. Who knows, your contribution might inspire the next generation of wizards and warlocks!
